markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I close my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308971000217-How-can-I-close-my-GCrypto-account)
- [How can I update my account information in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308652046361-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I update the details in my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10333738279321-How-can-I-update-the-details-in-my-GCrypto-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Closing your GCrypto account is **permanent and irreversible.** Once your account is closed, you will no longer have access to any associated data, funds, or transaction history.

### How to close your GCrypto account:

1\. **Make sure your GCrypto balance is zero**

Before closing your GCrypto account, ensure that **your trading wallet balance is zero**. Any remaining funds in your trading wallet will be **permanently lost and cannot be recovered** once the account is closed.

2\. **Request for Account Closure**

To close your GCrypto account, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcrypto::i_want_to_delete_my_gcrypto_account)

A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I send crypto over PHP 50,000 using GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308558631321-Send-Crypto-Over-PHP-50-000)
- [How can I withdraw from my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31304830152089-Withdraw-from-your-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [How can I sell crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31306888871833-Sell-crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [What coins can I trade in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781218166041-Coins-available-in-GCrypto)
- [What is the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303868127897-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
